thread.title: A look at Idaho's plan for handling shooters on campus
thread.title_full: A look at Idaho's plan for handling shooters on campus - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: A look at Idaho's plan for handling shooters on campus
text: BOISE, Idaho (AP) - A state law went into effect In July 2014 clearing the way for retired law enforcement officers and people with Idaho's enhanced concealed-carry permit to bring firearms to campus. The law bans weapons in dormitories and buildings that can hold more than 1,000 people. A spokesman ... ...
